subject: Completed All JUnit Test Classes - Custom Runner
msgSnippet: When executing JUnit tests from within Eclipse (right-click)... and using a custom runner as follows: public class SjtcWeldJunit4Runner extends
messageBody:
When executing JUnit tests from within Eclipse (right-click)... and using a custom runner as follows:

public class SjtcWeldJunit4Runner extends BlockJUnit4ClassRunner {

We need to know when all test classes have completed executing to perform limited global clean-up.

Does the runner-related API support determining when all classes are finished executing?
